title: A Friend Who I Loved for a Long Time - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Death of Loved Ones   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Short Story   Terminal Illness
author: 枝玖
description:
Ah Li, I will beg to the heavens so that you can live a bit longer.

I will risk all my luck and my life. I am willing.>
